file_content.text: The residents of this sector will have a better future because of you.
That swoop gang won't be causing any more trouble.
I heard what happened--news travels quickly in this sector. They attacked you, but you fought them off!
You have avenged my brother and freed us from the tyranny of the swoop gangs!
By avenging my brother and freeing us from the tyranny of the swoop gangs, you have earned your reward.
On behalf of all the citizens of this sector, thank you.
Use the EMP immobilizer to disable the swoop bikes. I'll be here when you're finished.
This sector used to be a good place to live. Quiet. Clean. Safe. Then the swoop gangs took over.
They terrorize the shopkeepers. Attack innocent civilians on the streets. Destroy our homes.
And they slaughter anyone brave enough to stand up to them, leaving him bleeding in the gutter while they roar off on their swoop bikes.
They killed someone you cared about, didn't they?
This sounds personal.
My brother. We ran a little shop together. The swoop gangs demanded we give them protection money.
If you hate it here so much, just move somewhere else.
Why don't you move?
No! My family has lived here for too many generations to let the swoop gangs push us out!
My brother refused to pay the swoop gangs off. He said, "Yeddu, we must take a stand!"
These swoop gangs need to be taught a lesson.
Someone should stop them.
You sound like my brother. He refused to pay the swoop gangs off. He said, "Yeddu, we must take a stand!"
They killed him for his defiance. I swore I would avenge him.
You're not thinking clearly. You seek closure in your brother's death, but throwing your life away is not the answer.
Hate leads to the dark side.
So... one angry Nikto against an entire swoop gang. How do you think that ends up?
Sounds like a bad move to me.
You don't have to worry. I have a plan, but I'm too much of a coward to act on it.
I'll say this much for you: You've got guts.
You seem pretty determined.
It's good to see you're not going to back down.
Your brother would be proud.
You don't understand. I made a promise to my brother, but I'm nothing but a coward.
How?
I bought some EMP immobilizers from the black market. The blast will fry the circuits of any swoop bike caught in the explosion.
The swoops are parked in the streets near the gang's base. But I'm too afraid to go there and plant the immobilizers. What if they see me?
I'm not afraid of this gang. Give the immobilizers to me.
I'll do it.
For the right price, I'll plant the immobilizers.
You could hire me.
This really isn't my problem.
I'm going now. [Refuse quest]
Leave this to me.
You would consider helping me with this? A stranger? I... I don't know what to say. Thank you.
Take these EMP immobilizers. Place them near the gang's swoop bikes.
When you set them off, the blast will fry all the circuits. We'll see how tough those gangs are when they can't just fly away on their precious swoops!
I'm in.
I'll help... for a price.
I don't have much, but whatever I have is yours if you take out those swoop bikes.
Be careful. With or without the immobilizers, the gang will not be happy to see you.
I'll wait here. Come back and see me when you're done.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Of course. I understand. Why should you risk yourself to help me?
I don't have time to talk with strangers.
